name: @ybouane/scrptly-ai-video-agent
description: Create videos from text prompts and optional reference images. Track progress and retrieve results as they’re ready. Accelerate content production for marketing, education, and social media.

tools.name: generateAiVideo
tools.title: Generate AI Video
tools.description: Generate a video based on a text prompt and optional context images.

prompt.description: A detailed text prompt for generating the video. It should include the duration of the video, the visual style, the plot/content and anything relevant to generate a high quality video.

url.description: The URL of a context image to be used in the video generation.

description.description: A brief description of the context image and how it should be used in the video.

context.description: An optional array of context images to guide the video generation. Each image should have a URL and a brief description.

approveUpTo.description: The maximum cost (in tokens) that the user approves for generating the video. Optional but highly recommended. Default is 10,000 tokens.

taskId.description: The ID of the task created to generate the AI video.

projectId.description: The ID of the AI video project created on Scrptly.

projectUrl.description: The URL to view and manage/tweak the generated AI video project on Scrptly.

tools.name: getTaskStatus
tools.title: Get Task Status
tools.description: Check the status of an AI video generation task.

taskId.description: The ID of the AI video generation task to check the status for.

status.description: The current status of the AI video generation task.

projectId.description: The ID of the AI video project created on Scrptly.

projectUrl.description: The URL to view and manage/tweak the generated AI video project on Scrptly.

statusMessage.description: A detailed message about the current status of the task.

resultVideoUrl.description: The URL of the generated video file, if the task is completed successfully.
